meanings.sent1: My ancestress was a strong and wise woman who passed down her stories to me.
meanings.sent2: I learned about my ancestress in a history book about our family tree.
meanings.sent3: When I asked my mom about our ancestress, she joked that she must have been a queen in a past life.
meanings.sent4: The spirit of my ancestress guides me like a guardian angel, watching over me.
meanings.sent5: In my dreams, I often see my ancestress standing proudly in a field of wildflowers.

meanings.definition: A woman from whom one is descended.
meanings.sent1: My ancestress is the reason I have my curly hair and green eyes.
meanings.sent2: I feel a deep connection to my ancestress whenever I visit her grave.
meanings.sent3: I like to imagine my ancestress cheering me on from the sidelines of life.
meanings.sent4: The strength and resilience of my ancestress flows through my veins.
meanings.sent5: Every time I bake her famous apple pie recipe, I feel close to my ancestress.
